mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTI_NO, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CATEGORY, NOTI_PW, NOTI_WRITER, NOTI_IMAGE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_HIT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.nextval,#{noti_title},#{noti_category}, #{noti_pw},#{noti_writer},#{fileName},#{noti_content},to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),0)
mapper.select: select qna_title,qna_writer,qna_date,qna_depth,qna_step,qna_group from qna order by TO_NUMBER(qna_step) asc

SELECT NOTI_NO, NOTI_TITLE, NEXT_NOTI_NO, NEXT_TITLE, PREV_NOTI_NO, PREV_TITLE FROM ( SELECT NOTI_NO, NOTI_TITLE, LEAD(NOTI_NO,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY NOTI_NO) NEXT_NOTI_NO, LEAD(NOTI_TITLE,1,'다음글이 없습니다') OVER(ORDER BY NOTI_NO) NEXT_TITLE, Lag(NOTI_NO,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY NOTI_NO) PREV_NOTI_NO, Lag(NOTI_TITLE,1,'이전글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY NOTI_NO) PREV_TITLE FROM notice )
WHERE NOTI_NO = #{NOTI_NO}
mapper.update: update qna set qna_hit = qna_hit + 1 where qna_no =:x
mapper.select: SELECT NVL((select qna_group from (select qna_group from qna order by TO_NUMBER(qna_group) desc) where rownum=1 ),0)+1 qna_group FROM dual
SELECT NVL((select qna_step from (select qna_step from qna order by TO_NUMBER(qna_step) desc) where rownum=1 ),0)+1 qna_step FROM dual
SELECT qna_step, qna_title, qna_category, qna_writer, qna_hit, qna_date, qna_no FROM qna order by TO_NUMBER(qna_step) desc
SELECT qna_no, qna_title, qna_category, qna_writer, qna_hit, qna_date, qna_content, qna_step, qna_depth, qna_group FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna ( qna_no, qna_title, qna_category, qna_pw, qna_writer, qna_hit, qna_date, qna_step, qna_depth, qna_group, qna_content ) VALUES ( seq_qna_no.nextval, #{qna_title}, #{qna_category}, #{qna_pw}, #{qna_writer}, 0, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI'), '1', '1', '1', #{qna_content} )
